name: mediacms
tagline: An open source platform for uploading and streaming media content
description: MediaCMS is an open-source media sharing platform that enables users to upload, transcode, and stream videos and photos. It includes advanced admin controls, metadata, and API, ideal for content hosting.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Automatically convert uploaded videos to multiple formats and resolutions for streaming

features.title: Photo Management
features.description: Upload and organize images with albums, tags, and metadata

features.title: Streaming Server
features.description: Deliver video content with adaptive bitrate streaming for optimal playback

features.title: User Management
features.description: Support multiple users with profiles, upload quotas, and permission levels

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find media by title, description, tags, or uploader using full-text search

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Enable discussions on media with threaded comments and moderation tools
